title: Performance Indicator Schema
description: Schema for the Performance Indicator domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name of the performance indicator

baselineValue.description: The initial reference value for comparison

variance.description: The difference between actual and target values

variancePercentage.description: The variance as a percentage of the target

validFrom.description: Start date of the performance measurement period

validTo.description: End date of the performance measurement period

aggregationPeriod.description: The time period over which performance is aggregated

comparisonOperator.description: Comparison operator used to evaluate the threshold

alertMessage.description: Custom message when threshold is breached

notificationRecipients.description: List of roles or individuals to notify

evaluativeModel.description: Model used to evaluate performance trends

modelType.description: Type of evaluative model (e.g., movingAverage, linearRegression)
